offgrid_check.title: ⚠️ Off-Grid Inverter Safety Check
offgrid_check.description:
**CRITICAL SAFETY CHECK**

Do you have an Off-Grid inverter (SPF series)?

Off-Grid inverters will experience a POWER RESET if auto-detection is attempted.

• If YES: You will manually select your model (safe)
• If NO: Automatic detection will proceed (safe for grid-tied models)

Examples of Off-Grid models: SPF 3000-6000 ES PLUS

data_description.has_offgrid: Enable this ONLY if you have an SPF series off-grid inverter. Off-Grid inverters use a different protocol and will reset if VPP registers are accessed.
